basics.titel: Andres Cardenas Portfolio de Desarrollo y Programador
basics.description11: I am a Junior Web Developer and Systems Analyst.
basics.description12: From Bogota, Colombia. Committed to excellence and innovation in every project I undertake
basics.description2: Explore my portfolio and web development and programming projects, discover my experience and skills.
basics.name: Andres Mauricio Cardenas Sanchez
basics.label: Developer and Software Engineer
basics.summary1: I am professional passionate about programming and technology, with outstanding experience in multimedia support, service desk management, web development and logistics management. My background includes a solid command of tools such as Visual Studio Code, Node.js, JavaScript, Docker and Linux. In addition, I am immersed in the study and practical application of languages such as JavaScrip and Python
basics.summary2: My commitment to continuous improvement drives me to stay updated in a constantly evolving technological environment. I am dedicated to expanding my programming skills and exploring new technologies that drive innovation and efficiency in every project I participate in.
basics.summary3: Explore my Portfolio to discover more about my projects, skills and how I can contribute to the success of your team or project.
basics.summary4: Furthermore, I am in the process of improving my English level to enhance my communication and collaboration skills in an international environment.

work.summary1: I am specializing in the development of web applications, excelling in the creation of innovative solutions. My experience includes first and second level multimedia support, with a focus on service desk management. However, where I really shine is in supporting the development of our own web applications, using tools such as HTML, CSS, JS and NodeJS. My experience includes efficient deployment through Docker containers.
work.summary2: Durin my work experience, I successfully managed inventory control and product rotation, analyzing variations to identify causes and develop action plans. I efficiently carried out weekly and monthly inventory counts, optimizing processes to ensure accuracy and goal achievement. As responsible for logistics, I coordinated orders, reception, storage, preservation, rotation, exhibition and dispatches, focused on ensuring customer satisfaction and achieving sales goals. In addition, I supervised the operation, maintaining equipment and infrastructure, prioritizing daily cleaning and safety with immediate incident reports.
work.summary3: Like Administrator, I acquired key skills in inventory management and logistics during my work experience. I led inventory taking, ensured compliance with quality standards, and coordinated order logistics, storage and display. My focus on operational efficiency included maintaining equipment and infrastructure, ensuring daily safety and cleanliness. I handled the petty cash with precision, managing the collection and recording of sales. My strategic contribution and precise execution could be a valuable asset to your team, combining technical skills with a results-oriented approach.

education.title2: MISION TIC 2022 - In-depth Mobile App Development
education.title3: MISION TIC 2022 - Fundamentals of Python Programming

projects.description1: Development of a web application aimed at efficiently managing the consecutive numbers of official communications in our company. The application features a robust access control system through Active Directory, thus ensuring the security and privacy of information, all deployed in Docker.
projects.description2: Minimalist portfolio developed with Astro, Tailwind, and TypeScript, designed to be extremely simple and print-ready. It offers a clean and professional presentation of projects, following the foundations of the Midudev tutorial and tailored to the profile of a selection psychologist.
